text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/a0y3StFiss

On Sat 3 April 2021, 3,423 new cases and 10 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK

31,425,682 people have received the first dose of a #vaccine and 5,205,505 have received a 2nd dose https://t.co/3REeDWsD4l
